creator: RAFA AI, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
RAFA IS AN INVESTMENT RESEARCH SUPER APP.

It offers a simple, clean and intuitive interface, power-packed with features like Aggregated Market News, Charts, Insights, Portfolio monitoring, Fund holdings, Company fundamentals, short reports, levels, and trends.

Whether you are investing in stocks or cryptocurrencies, Rafa provides you with a cutting-edge AI-driven platform to build and optimize your portfolio like a Pro. Let Rafa AI do the heavy lifting for you, while you focus on making money from your investments.

Portfolio Monitoring
--
To get started, add a few of your favorite stocks to your watchlist. As soon as the stocks are added, RAFA starts monitoring them and provides you with an important trade map.

Streamlined Workflow
--
RAFA organizes the most important data points associated with a stock in a seamless workflow. Easily switch between candlestick and line chart views, enable important technical indicators on the charts by just a press of a button.

Personalized insights
--
RAFA provides a powerful and easy to use interface for generating your own unique insights based on various technical and fundamental criteria.

Stock sentiments
--
RAFA uses an innovative visualization technique – Shapemetrics, to automatically surface extreme conditions in a stock's lifecycle that are often missed by even the most experienced investors and traders.

Lightning-fast Trend Analysis
--
Detect conditions when you can hedge an existing position or generate a higher yield. Trendmetrics generates an extremely simple to understand short report allowing you to get the sentiment and near-term direction.

Real-time market News
--
RAFA aggregates market news from more than 1000 sources across the globe in real-time and provides you with powerful filters. Various key events in the news like analyst upgrades, funds buying and selling, trending, and earnings are captured and highlighted for you.

Fund Holdings
--
RAFA funds page is the place to get all relevant information about the latest SEC filings on holding of funds and institutions.

Smart Alerts
--
Stay updated with customized alerts for your stocks and portfolio

Terms and Conditions:
--
https://www.rafa.ai/terms

Disclaimer:
--

creator: RAFA AI, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
RAFA IS AN INVESTMENT RESEARCH SUPER APP.

It offers a simple, clean and intuitive interface, power-packed with features like Aggregated Market News, Charts, Insights, Portfolio monitoring, Fund holdings, Company fundamentals, short reports, levels, and trends.

Whether you are investing in stocks or cryptocurrencies, Rafa provides you with a cutting-edge AI-driven platform to build and optimize your portfolio like a Pro. Let Rafa AI do the heavy lifting for you, while you focus on making money from your investments.

Portfolio Monitoring
--
To get started, add a few of your favorite stocks to your watchlist. As soon as the stocks are added, RAFA starts monitoring them and provides you with an important trade map.

Streamlined Workflow
--
RAFA organizes the most important data points associated with a stock in a seamless workflow. Easily switch between candlestick and line chart views, enable important technical indicators on the charts by just a press of a button.

Personalized insights
--
RAFA provides a powerful and easy to use interface for generating your own unique insights based on various technical and fundamental criteria.

Stock sentiments
--
RAFA uses an innovative visualization technique – Shapemetrics, to automatically surface extreme conditions in a stock's lifecycle that are often missed by even the most experienced investors and traders.

Lightning-fast Trend Analysis
--
Detect conditions when you can hedge an existing position or generate a higher yield. Trendmetrics generates an extremely simple to understand short report allowing you to get the sentiment and near-term direction.

Real-time market News
--
RAFA aggregates market news from more than 1000 sources across the globe in real-time and provides you with powerful filters. Various key events in the news like analyst upgrades, funds buying and selling, trending, and earnings are captured and highlighted for you.

Fund Holdings
--
RAFA funds page is the place to get all relevant information about the latest SEC filings on holding of funds and institutions.

Smart Alerts
--
Stay updated with customized alerts for your stocks and portfolio

Whether you are investing in stocks or cryptocurrencies, Rafa provides you with a cutting-edge AI-driven platform to build and optimize your portfolio like a Pro. Let Rafa AI do the heavy lifting for you, while you focus on making money from your investments.

Portfolio Monitoring
--
To get started, add a few of your favorite stocks to your watchlist. As soon as the stocks are added, RAFA starts monitoring them and provides you with an important trade map.

Streamlined Workflow
--
RAFA organizes the most important data points associated with a stock in a seamless workflow. Easily switch between candlestick and line chart views, enable important technical indicators on the charts by just a press of a button.

Personalized insights
--
RAFA provides a powerful and easy to use interface for generating your own unique insights based on various technical and fundamental criteria.

Stock sentiments
--
RAFA uses an innovative visualization technique – Shapemetrics, to automatically surface extreme conditions in a stock's lifecycle that are often missed by even the most experienced investors and traders.

Lightning-fast Trend Analysis
--
Detect conditions when you can hedge an existing position or generate a higher yield. Trendmetrics generates an extremely simple to understand short report allowing you to get the sentiment and near-term direction.

Real-time market News
--
RAFA aggregates market news from more than 1000 sources across the globe in real-time and provides you with powerful filters. Various key events in the news like analyst upgrades, funds buying and selling, trending, and earnings are captured and highlighted for you.

Fund Holdings
--
RAFA funds page is the place to get all relevant information about the latest SEC filings on holding of funds and institutions.

Smart Alerts
--
Stay updated with customized alerts for your stocks and portfolio

--

descriptionHtml:
RAFA: Robo Analyst for All

It offers a simple, clean and intuitive interface, power-packed with features like Aggregated Market News, Charts, Insights, Portfolio monitoring, Fund holdings, Company fundamentals, short reports, levels, and trends.

Whether you are investing in stocks or cryptocurrencies, Rafa provides you with a cutting-edge AI-driven platform to build and optimize your portfolio like a Pro. Let Rafa AI do the heavy lifting for you, while you focus on making money from your investments.

Portfolio Monitoring
--
To get started, add a few of your favorite stocks to your watchlist. As soon as the stocks are added, RAFA starts monitoring them and provides you with an important trade map.

Streamlined Workflow
--
RAFA organizes the most important data points associated with a stock in a seamless workflow. Easily switch between candlestick and line chart views, enable important technical indicators on the charts by just a press of a button.

Personalized insights
--
RAFA provides a powerful and easy to use interface for generating your own unique insights based on various technical and fundamental criteria.

Stock sentiments
--
RAFA uses an innovative visualization technique – Shapemetrics, to automatically surface extreme conditions in a stock's lifecycle that are often missed by even the most experienced investors and traders.

Lightning-fast Trend Analysis
--
Detect conditions when you can hedge an existing position or generate a higher yield. Trendmetrics generates an extremely simple to understand short report allowing you to get the sentiment and near-term direction.

Real-time market News
--
RAFA aggregates market news from more than 1000 sources across the globe in real-time and provides you with powerful filters. Various key events in the news like analyst upgrades, funds buying and selling, trending, and earnings are captured and highlighted for you.

Fund Holdings
--
RAFA funds page is the place to get all relevant information about the latest SEC filings on holding of funds and institutions.

Smart Alerts
--
Stay updated with customized alerts for your stocks and portfolio

--

title: RAFA: AI Investment Copilot

creator: Tides.Network, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Are you tired of missing out on big wins in the market because you don't have access to the information that Wall Street pros use to make their fortunes? Are you sick of getting left behind in the dust by the latest market trends? Are you ready to take your portfolio to the next level and Invest like a Pro?

RAFA is like having a powerful, secret weapon in your investing arsenal. It helps you find extremely profitable opportunities and avoid costly mistakes.
Identify what is the source of Risk in your portfolio, minimize drawdowns in volatile markets, track unusual options activity in the companies you are invested in, and get ideas for blockbuster trades using Rafa’s cutting edge AI.

Analyze Your Portfolio Risk: Understand and manage your portfolio's risk level with RAFA’s intuitive portfolio risk score. Keep tabs on volatility, concentration, and asset allocation to optimize risk-return tradeoff. This risk score helps you understand and compare the risk profiles of different portfolios or track and adjust your portfolio's risk level over time.

Unusual Options Activity: With RAFA’s cutting edge options activity analysis, identify mispriced opportunities before the rest of the market catches up.
AI-Powered Screener: RAFA filters the universe of stocks based on specific criteria based on your preferences to find the best investment ideas daily.

Watchfolio Insights: Group and track the performance of stocks before investing. RAFA's AI engine generates deep insights on all your watchfolios, helping you make informed investment decisions.

Concentration Analysis: Assess the diversification of your portfolio and detect concentration risks to ensure a balanced investment strategy.

Stock Drill-down View: Perform exhaustive analysis with comprehensive data sets, summarizations, and visualizations to make well-informed investment decisions.

RAFA is the best AI Trading Software for investors seeking to level up their financial game.

RAFA - Your personal copilot in the world of investing.

Leverage the perfect blend of technical and fundamental analysis to guide your investment decisions and build a prosperous portfolio, fast.

title:
RAFA: AI Investment Copilot
2024.04.02

creator: Tides.Network, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Meet your personalized team of investing AI Agents. It’s like having your own team of experts each specializing in one investing area:
- Fundamental Analysis
- Technical Analysis
- Momentum
- Portfolio Strategy
- Risk Analysis
- Macro

All working together to maximize your investing returns. They're constantly monitoring your portfolio and the markets for opportunities and threats, they understand your trade behavior, and help you develop investing discipline by learning from past mistakes and successes.

RAFA is your bleeding edge investing companion, designed to bring the “A Team” that elite Wall Street institutions wish they had, but right now at your fingertips.

__ Why RAFA is Better than Any Other Investing Tool:

• Personalized AI Investing Agents: Imagine a team that knows everything about the market, predicts changes instantaneously, and customizes its advice based on your investment style. RAFA's AI Agents are your relentless allies, learning from your trading patterns to help you refine your strategy and avoid past mistakes.

• Beyond Basic Analysis: Rafa’s AI Agents don’t give out generic advice like ChatGPT or Claude. Rafa’s Quant Agents are connected directly to a gigantic real-time stream of data from exchanges and many other sources, including 1000s of news sources, and even cryptocurrency on-chain and off-chain activities. They learn and adapt in real time.

• Revolutionary Multi Agent Architecture: Unlike current Large Language Models, RAFA’s hybrid agent architecture combines advanced quant models with Large Language Models, which current state of the art GPT systems do not have. That is why Rafa is uniquely positioned to be the best AI Co-Pilot for investing.

• Advanced Analytics and Insights: With Agents like Analyst Pro, News Guru, Strategy Wiz, Quant Pro, and Options Pro RAFA is your A Team of investing experts. Dive deep into financials, earnings, SEC filings, market news, and technical trends to quickly discover the opportunities and risks most relevant to you.

__ Take Your Trading To the Next Level, WIthout Years of Trial and Error

• Tailored Analysis: RAFA's AI learns your past and current investment behavior, offering insights specifically relevant to your portfolio and investment goals.

• Actionable Strategies: RAFA’s Agents don't just provide answers; they craft strategies, helping you develop a disciplined investing approach while maximizing your potential for success.

• Hidden Signals: From unusual options activity to institutional money flow and insider trades. Stay ahead of moves by big players.

__ Key Benefits

• AI-Powered Screener: Say goodbye to overwhelming filter selections. RAFA effortlessly identifies the day's best investment opportunities, tailored just for you, and at the right time.

• Watchfolio Insights: Test your theses BEFORE putting real money at risk, and easily share strategies with the community to discuss and validate your ideas.

• Market Dynamics: Stay on top of live macro data, trending stocks, and sector performances, ensuring you never miss a beat.

• Deep View Analysis: Streamline your market analysis with RAFA’s "Deep View," effortlessly revealing AI trend scores, support, resistance levels, and risk assessments.

__ Who RAFA is For:

• Every Investor Type: Whether you're a novice, a seasoned trader, or a long-term investor, RAFA’s AI elevates your investment game to new heights. If you are short on time and long on ambition, RAFA is a must have tool for you.

• Market Readiness: Be prepared for any market conditions with insights that uncover the best opportunities, regardless of market trends.

Download RAFA Now: Your Gateway to AI-Powered Investing Mastery!

Experience a new era of investing where technology meets personalization. With RAFA, you're not just using an app; you're gaining a team of powerful allies, ready to help you navigate the market with precision and confidence.

RAFA - Where AI Meets Investing Genius.
